trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Grants
There were no other sightings in Grants on or around September 21st 1993
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the nearby arroyo (app. 1 block away) when I turned toward home. I sawa trianglular object, hovering above my appartment building. It had two, redelongated lights and three white lights(at the points). I couldnt believe whatI was seeing, I thought it was a helicopter(we have a hospital nearby). I wentover to the hospital, but there was nothing there.
